name: Altered Conference | Berlin
tagline: Talks and workshops related to altered states of consciousness
body:
## Join us at Topics Saturday, 22 October for Altered Conference  

### Schedule

####Morning Session 10:00-14:00  

We begin with a short Blue Lotus tea ceremony and light meditation as a prelude to the first talk

* _Exploring the Other Realms_: plants, ritual, and experience - [Anne Merrill](www.annelouisemerrill.com)
* _Psychedelics Oblige_: The responsibility to manifest your vision - Dax DeFranco
* _The Necessity of Building a Worldview_ - Paul Brown

####Evening Session 18:30-22:00  

* _Between Hysteria and Ecstacy_: Ludwig Klages and Philosophy - [Dr. Rico Sneller](http://www.universiteitleiden.nl/en/staffmembers/rico-sneller)
* _Heart of Darkness_: Darkness retreats as a psychedelic experience - Vladimir Stepan
* _With Entheogens to Spiritual Awakening_ - [Oliver Martin](http://www.psilohuasca.com/about/)

###Ticket Prices

Morning Session	15 Euro  
Evening Session	15 Euro  
Both Sessions	25 Euro  

T-Shirt	15 Euro  

If you buy a ticket to both Sessions, the t-shirt price is reduced to 10â‚¬. Please note that we'll only print t-shirts once in October when we have the final count.  

Tickets can be purchased at Topics Berlin or via bank transfer with the following details:

    IBAN: DE63 1005 0000 0190 3724 78  
    BIC: BELADEBEXXX

Please make your payment to "Topics Books" and note that it is for "Altered Conference".  
Include your name, email address, and, if you'd like to order a t-shirt, please note the size.

### Contact
For more information please stop by [Topics Berlin](http://www.topics-berlin.com/) at 166 Weserstr or contact alteredconference@gmail.com
